text: The operator of the new convention center hotel, the Hospitality High School of Washington, D.C., and the District of Columbia Hotel Association shall create an internship program for the Hospitality High School of Washington, D.C., students at the new convention center hotel.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 redesignated § 904 of D.C. Law 10-188 as § 244 of D.C. Law 10- 188.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(i) of New Convention Center Hotel Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-186, August 12, 2009, 56 DCR 6967).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-78, see notes following § 10-1202.41.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 10-551.02.

DC CODE § 10-1202.44

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

part.text: Construction of the Convention Center Hotel.
